alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 4:26PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Kings, northwestern Tulare and central Fresno Counties through 500 PM PST... At 424 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kingsburg, or 9 miles north of Hanford, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. Cold air funnel clouds are alos possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Hail covere3d roads could lead to dangerous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Visalia, Hanford, Kingsburg, Home Garden, Traver, Laton and Goshen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley
